title: Camera Lock Bug
body:
Whenever I click on my mini map or press Y to unlock the screen, sometimes my screen stays unlocked and I can't re-lock it. I have to die for my screen to lock on my champion again. This is really annoying and costed me a few fights and I just wanted to know if anyone else has the problem and if they have a fix for it other than dying. Please and Thank you ^^.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body:
Heyo,

Click the small camera on the bottom side of the mini-map, that'll unlock or lock the camera appropriately. You can also drag the white box on the minimap to force the camera into standard un-locked mode.
At least some of the time, if the camera bugs out in this manner this won't actually work. It will stay locked regardless of UI interaction until your champ dies.

> [{quoted}](name=Trundle Bundle,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f5A7N3Jq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-12T01:52:10.280+0000)
>
> At least some of the time, if the camera bugs out in this manner this won't actually work. It will stay locked regardless of UI interaction until your champ dies.

Yea, if only I knew what caused it and see if I can hand fix it by messing with the coding somehow but I really don't want to screw up my client so I won't.

Hey, sorry for the inappropriate thread necromancy, but every time I start a game my camera will start in the "locked" setting and I have to press Y to unlock it. I find this annoying but can't find a fix for it. I use spacebar to attack move instead of A and sometime will double tap Y if I get lost in a team fight to re-center my camera.

Do you think you can help me?

> [{quoted}](name=DeadUnborn,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f5A7N3Jq,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2018-01-19T23:34:34.434+0000)
>
> Hey, sorry for the inappropriate thread necromancy, but every time I start a game my camera will start in the "locked" setting and I have to press Y to unlock it. I find this annoying but can't find a fix for it. I use spacebar to attack move instead of A and sometime will double tap Y if I get lost in a team fight to re-center my camera.
> 
> Do you think you can help me?

Have you tried completely resetting your keybindings? It seems like it's defaulting to locked camera, which isn't the normal case.

thanks for the response! Support actually helped me with this some days ago. All I had to do was play a summoners rift game and delete the game and persisted settings files from my Lol folder while playing so they would reset-- apparently, they were corrupted. 

My problem goes so way back that I thought Rito actually tried to enforce a locked camera play to help noobies haha (I've been having this problem since day 1...  four years ago; never realized unlocked camera could be default until a couple of weeks ago XD)

Again thanks for trying to help anyhow

> [{quoted}](name=Morgageddon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f5A7N3Jq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-11T23:45:37.397+0000)

> Heyo,

> Click the small camera on the bottom side of the mini-map, that'll unlock or lock the camera appropriately. You can also drag the white box on the minimap to force the camera into standard un-locked mode.

Unfortunately that does not work. This has been an issue for me since I started playing league in season 5.the only way to fix it is to reset all settings then go back to spawn then change the hotkey for unlocking camera to spacebar.  Even doing this which takes about 2 mins does not always work. It sucks not being able to play champions like zac and xerath. This is a really bad bug for people that like to use locked cameras.
This is a band-aid solution, but you can also press spacebar to center the screen on your champ (although it'll only stay this way as long as you hold the key).

> [{quoted}](name=TAScientist,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=f5A7N3Jq,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-12T01:34:29.487+0000)
>
> This is a band-aid solution, but you can also press spacebar to center the screen on your champ (although it'll only stay this way as long as you hold the key).

I do admit that after doing this a few times it does help but makes it really hard to do much, seeing as my hands are at an awkward position. Thx for the advice, helps until I die :3

Hey, after this happened to me a few times, I found that if I clicked and dragged on the mini map a little bit, when I let go of the mouse button the camera lock would return to normal. Works 100% of the time for me.

Sometimes my camera is locked on my champion when I die. I believe this happens when I press the space bar, and it doesn't happen every time. Also, I do press "Y" and the space bar, click the minimap, and smash my keyboard...
Only thing I can do is TAB and "P" (shop)

Would be nice to see what's going in the map during those times I die.

I tried that before and it didn't help, I also went to the options section in the interface tab and pressed the default button for the interface and that didn't work either. I have also tried dragging the box but nothing worked until I died :/. I tried going to my desktop by pressing tab and alt together and went back into the game but that didn't work either.
